mapper.insert: insert into review values (review_id.nextval, receiptorder_id.nextval, prod_id.nextval, #{prod_name}, #{review_writer}, #{review_score}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{review_pict})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rn, e.* from (select * from review order by review_id desc) e) where rn between #{offset} and (#{offset} + #{boardsPerPage} - 1)
select * from (select rownum as rn, e.* from (select * from review where review_writer = #{review_writer} order by review_id desc) e) where rn between #{offset} and (#{offset} + #{boardsPerPage} - 1)
select * from (select rownum as rn, e.* from (select * from review where prod_id = #{ prod_id } order by review_id desc) e) where rn between #{offset} and (#{offset} + #{boardsPerPage} - 1)
select count(*) from review where prod_id = #{ prod_id }
select review_id from review where prod_id=#{prod_id}
